Test Name: RICE (RAST ImmunoCAP Experimental), IGE (Immunoglobulin E), SERUM (General serological tests)
Specimen Type: Serum; plasma (EDTA-treated plasma acceptable for RICE)
Purpose: To generate accurate analytical results for allergen-specific IgE (RICE, IGE) and other routine serological assays (SERUM).
Container: Serum separator (red or gold-top) tube for serum; EDTA tube for plasma specimens
Equipment: Automated immunoassay analyzer (for RICE, IGE) and general serological analyzers (for SERUM tests)
